alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:54AM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph over exposed terrain. * WHERE...For the Winter Weather Advisory this morning into Saturday morning, this includes most all areas in central and eastern Lake Counties including Highway 140, 395 and 31 as well as Valley Falls, Lakeview, Summer Lake and surrounding communities. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.
